notes.text: You can now enable the save and leave feature to allow users to save an object page and navigate back to the list report page
We now support pasting content into table columns using the Text_Only text arrangement
You can now use the `subSectionCreated` parameter to trigger a callback function when a subsection is created for the first time
We now correctly resolve action parameter values when the Common.Text annotation points to a property with the same name
You can now set menu items defined using DataActionForGroup to be navigable
We now ensure that the Enabled property of actions is bound correctly for grouped table actions in custom sections
You can now use inclusive semantic date ranges, such as 'Last X Months to Date' and 'Next X Months to Date'
You can now enable lazy loading for the entire application
